edge: In October 2008, Josh Brolin entered talks to be cast as Jonah Hex under the direction of Neveldine and Taylor.

Brolin (actor) hated the experience making the film 'Jonah Hex' and implied that the filming schedule was hectic, stating that they had to reshoot 66 pages in 12 days.

Brolin (actor) blamed the failure of 'Jonah Hex' on studio interference in the film's post-production and called Hayward 'inexperienced' and a 'bad choice (of director)', but didn't necessarily blame it all at him because it was his bad choice.
Megan Fox was critical of the movie 'Jonah Hex' and said she doesn't even want her kids to see it.
